snippet: The infected villagers were found in a district where an unlicensed medic has been accused of spreading the virus with contaminated equipment, according to findings released by the government.
abstract: Cambodian health authorities link 212 HIV cases to unlicensed medic charged with murder who allegedly spread the virus with contaminated equipment.
lead_paragraph: The infected villagers were found in a district where an unlicensed medic has been accused of spreading the virus with contaminated equipment, according to findings released by the government.

headline.main: Cambodia: 212 H.I.V. Cases Linked to Contamination
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: 212 H.I.V. Cases Linked to Contamination
